name: LinkedIn
description: Integrate with LinkedIn to get, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Get Profile
tools.description: Get the authenticated LinkedIn user's profile or another user's profile by URN. Returns name, headline, industry, and location.

tools.name: Create Post
tools.description: Create a new post on LinkedIn on behalf of the authenticated user. Supports text content and visibility settings.

tools.name: List Connections
tools.description: List the authenticated LinkedIn user's connections. Returns names and profile information.

tools.name: Search People
tools.description: Search for people on LinkedIn by keyword. Returns matching profiles with names, headlines, and locations.

tools.name: Get Company
tools.description: Get a LinkedIn company page by its organization ID. Returns company name, description, industry, employee count, and website.
